NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}]},"events":{"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptNegotiation(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Accept a negotiation and proceed to agreement","params":{"_counterparty":"Address of the counterparty","_offerId":"ID of the offer"}},"addAdmin(address)":{"details":"Grant admin role to an address","params":{"_account":"Address to grant the role to"}},"addModerator(address)":{"details":"Grant moderator role to an address","params":{"_account":"Address to grant the role to"}},"addNegotiationMessage(bytes32,string,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Add a negotiation message to an offer","params":{"_message":"Text message for negotiation","_offerId":"ID of the offer","_proposedEnergyAmount":"New proposed energy amount (0 if not proposing a new amount)","_proposedPrice":"New proposed price (0 if not proposing a new price)"}},"addUser(address)":{"details":"Grant user role to an address","params":{"_account":"Address to grant the role to"}},"cancelNegotiation(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Cancel a negotiation and revert to active status","params":{"_counterparty":"Address of the counterparty","_offerId":"ID of the offer"}},"cancelUnfundedAgreement(bytes32)":{"details":"This function can only be called when the contract is not paused and is non-reentrant.","params":{"_agreementId":"The ID of the agreement to cancel. Requirements: - The agreement must exist. - The agreement must be active. - The agreement must not be funded. - The funding deadline must have expired. - The caller must be the buyer, seller, or an authorized admin or moderator. Emits: - AgreementCancelled event when the agreement is successfully cancelled. - OfferUpdated event when the associated offer is reactivated."}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor to set the energy token address","params":{"_tokenAddress":"Address of the energy token contract"}},"createAgreement(bytes32)":{"details":"Create a trade agreement from an offer","params":{"_offerId":"ID of the offer"},"returns":{"_0":"agreementId ID of the created agreement"}},"createOffer(uint8,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Create a new energy trading offer","params":{"_endTime":"End time for energy delivery","_energyAmount":"Amount of energy in kWh","_offerType":"Type of the offer (BUY or SELL)","_pricePerUnit":"Price per kWh in tokens","_startTime":"Start time for energy delivery"},"returns":{"offerId":"Hash ID of the created offer"}},"disputeAndRefund(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Dispute and request refund for incomplete delivery","params":{"_agreementId":"ID of the agreement","_reason":"Reason for the refund request"}},"fundAgreement(bytes32)":{"details":"This function can only be called by the buyer of the agreement. It transfers the final total price of the agreement from the buyer to the escrow contract. The agreement must be active, not already funded, and within the funding deadline. The contract must not be paused and the function is non-reentrant.","params":{"_agreementId":"The unique identifier of the agreement to be funded. Requirements: The agreement must exist. The agreement must be active. The agreement must not already be funded. The current timestamp must be before or equal to the funding deadline. The caller must be the buyer of the agreement. The token transfer from the buyer to the escrow contract must succeed. Emits: AgreementFunded Emitted when the agreement is successfully funded."}},"getActiveOffers()":{"details":"Get all active offers","returns":{"_0":"Array of active offer IDs"}},"getNegotiationMessages(bytes32)":{"details":"Get negotiation messages for an offer","params":{"_offerId":"ID of the offer"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of negotiation messages"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getUserAgreements(address)":{"details":"Get agreements associated with a user","params":{"_user":"Address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of agreement IDs associated with the user"}},"getUserOffers(address)":{"details":"Get offers created by a user","params":{"_user":"Address of the user"},"returns":{"_0":"Array of offer IDs created by the user"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"moderateOffer(bytes32)":{"details":"Cancel an offer (for moderation purposes)","params":{"_offerId":"ID of the offer to cancel Only callable by moderators or admins"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pause()":{"details":"Pause the contract Only callable by admin"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"removeModerator(address)":{"details":"Revoke moderator role from an address","params":{"_account":"Address to revoke the role from"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"reportEnergyDelivery(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Report energy delivery progress","params":{"_agreementId":"ID of the agreement","_percentage":"Percentage of energy delivered (25, 50, 75, or 100)"}},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setEscrowContract(address)":{"details":"Set a new escrow contract","params":{"_newEscrowContract":"Address of the new escrow contract Only callable by owner"}},"startEnergyTransfer(bytes32)":{"details":"Start the energy transfer process","params":{"_agreementId":"ID of the agreement"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpause the contract Only callable by admin"}},"title":"EnergyMarketplace","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"cancelUnfundedAgreement(bytes32)":{"notice":"Cancels an unfunded agreement if the funding deadline has documentation.text:
@dev Remove an offer from the active offers list
 @param _offerId ID of the offer to remove

Funds an existing agreement.
 @dev This function can only be called by the buyer of the agreement.
 It transfers the final total price of the agreement from the buyer to the escrow contract.
 The agreement must be active, not already funded, and within the funding deadline.
 The contract must not be paused and the function is non-reentrant.
 @param _agreementId The unique identifier of the agreement to be funded.
 Requirements:
 The agreement must exist.
 The agreement must be active.
 The agreement must not already be funded.
 The current timestamp must be before or equal to the funding deadline.
 The caller must be the buyer of the agreement.
 The token transfer from the buyer to the escrow contract must succeed.
 Emits:
 AgreementFunded Emitted when the agreement is successfully funded.

@dev Start the energy transfer process
 @param _agreementId ID of the agreement

@notice Cancels an unfunded agreement if the funding deadline has expired.
 @dev This function can only be called when the contract is not paused and is non-reentrant.
 @param _agreementId The ID of the agreement to cancel.
 Requirements:
 - The agreement must exist.
 - The agreement must be active.
 - The agreement must not be funded.
 - The funding deadline must have expired.
 - The caller must be the buyer, seller, or an authorized admin or moderator.
 Emits:
 - AgreementCancelled event when the agreement is successfully cancelled.
 - OfferUpdated event when the associated offer is reactivated.
